Author: linedryonly
Text: I can't really tell you how to refeed (I suck at making logical decisions after fasting so I'm not fit to advise), but as for weight gain/loss it helps me to track my TDEE vs calorie intake to get a realistic view of actual body mass lost rather than water weight lost during fasting/gained during refeed. I made a post a while ago with a spreadsheet just for that purpose -feel free to dig it up if you think it will help.
